metadata.job_title: Senior Data Engineer â€“ Commerce Data Pipelines

data_maturity_score.evidence: Modern data stack (Airflow, Snowflake/Redshift), data quality frameworks, performance tuning practices suggest defined maturity level, but contract nature indicates ongoing development

data_maturity_level.evidence: Matches score of 3 - documented processes, modern tools, some governance practices mentioned

maturity_signals.evidence: Airflow orchestration, Snowflake/Redshift warehouses, data quality frameworks explicitly mentioned

scope_creep_score.evidence: Well-defined data engineering role focused on ETL, data modeling, and pipeline development without mention of data science, analytics, or DevOps responsibilities

overtime_risk_score.evidence: Contract role with specific timeline mentions 'fast-paced environment' but no extreme overtime signals; hybrid model provides some work-life balance

role_clarity.evidence: Specific technical requirements, clear responsibilities, well-defined data engineering scope

overall_red_flag_score.evidence: Moderate risk due to contract nature, visa restrictions, and fast-paced environment, but well-defined role and modern tech stack are positive

reporting_structure_clarity.evidence: No mention of reporting structure, manager, or team hierarchy in job posting

manager_level_inferred.evidence: No managerial titles or reporting structure mentioned in job description

team_growth_velocity.evidence: No information about team size, growth plans, or hiring velocity provided

team_composition.evidence: No team composition information provided in job posting

reporting_structure.evidence: No reporting structure mentioned in job description

cross_functional_embedded.evidence: Mentions partnering with business, analytics, and infrastructure teams but suggests centralized data function rather than embedded model

work_life_balance_score.evidence: Hybrid model (4 days onsite, Friday remote) provides flexibility, but contract nature and fast-paced environment suggest moderate work pressure

growth_opportunities_score.evidence: 10-month contract role with no mention of career development, learning opportunities, or advancement paths

tech_culture_score.evidence: Modern tech stack and data quality focus are positive, but contract nature and lack of culture details limit assessment

tech_culture_signals.evidence: No tech culture signals mentioned - no OSS, conferences, hackathons, or innovation time

dev_practices_mentioned.evidence: Pipeline monitoring mentioned in responsibilities, but no other development practices specified

innovation_signals.evidence: Focus on maintaining and enhancing existing ETL pipelines rather than innovation or experimentation

tech_debt_awareness.evidence: No mention of tech debt, modernization efforts, or improving existing systems

ai_integration_level.evidence: No AI, ML, or GenAI mentioned in job description - focus is on traditional ETL and data warehousing

ml_tools_expected.evidence: No ML tools mentioned - role focused on traditional data engineering stack

hiring_urgency.evidence: No urgent start date mentioned, standard contract hiring process indicated

competition_level.evidence: Senior role with specific technical requirements in major tech hubs (Seattle, LA, NYC) suggests moderate competition

company_stage_inferred.evidence: Company name 'aKUBE' and minimal company description provide no clear stage indicators

hiring_velocity.evidence: Single contract position mentioned with no indication of broader hiring plans

team_size_signals.evidence: No team size information provided in job posting

funding_stage_signals.evidence: No funding or company stage information mentioned

role_creation_type.evidence: Contract nature suggests project-based need but no clear indication if this is new headcount, backfill, or expansion

strength_details: Competitive hourly rate up to $92.5/hr on W2
Modern data stack with Snowflake/Redshift, Airflow, Python/PySpark
Well-defined data engineering responsibilities without scope creep
Hybrid work model with 4 days onsite, Friday remote
concern_details: 10-month contract duration with no conversion to FTE mentioned
Work authorization excludes H1B, OPT, CPT - US citizens/GC holders only
No career development, learning opportunities, or advancement paths mentioned
No reporting structure or team composition information provided
best_fit_details: Senior data engineers with 3+ years experience in ETL and data warehousing
Engineers experienced with Airflow, Snowflake/Redshift, and Python/PySpark
Professionals seeking short-term contract work with modern tech stack
probe_details: Ask about team size, composition, and reporting structure
Understand the specific project scope and success metrics
Clarify if contract extension or conversion to FTE is possible
Ask about work hours, overtime expectations, and on-call requirements
leverage_details: Strong match for all must-have skills (SQL, ETL, Airflow, Snowflake/Redshift, Python/PySpark)
Data modeling expertise (dimensional and normalization) is specific and valuable
summary.overall_assessment: Solid contract opportunity for senior data engineers with modern tech stack and competitive compensation. Well-defined role without scope creep, but limited by 10-month duration and lack of growth opportunities. Best suited for experienced contractors or professionals seeking short-term engagement with major tech companies.
